name: saunter
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to walk in a slow and relaxed way, often in no particular direction: He sauntered by, looking very pleased with himself. Synonyms
amble
mosey informal
stroll

a slow and relaxed walk, often in no particular direction: I took a little saunter through the town. It was just an idle saunter in a lovely English lane. Synonyms
amble
stroll
walk
More examplesFewer examplesTake a saunter through a museum.It's a one-and-a-half-mile saunter to the pub along a nature trail.Enjoy a pleasant saunter across Wimbledon Park.

to walk in a slow and relaxed way: My cousin stood up, yawning, and sauntered away toward the door.
